9 class NiryoRobotRpiNode:

11  def __init__(self):
12  rospy.logdebug("NiryoRobotRpi - Entering in Init")
13 
14  hardware_version = rospy.get_param('~hardware_version')
15 
16  if hardware_version in ["ned2", "ned3pro"]:
17  from niryo_robot_rpi.panel_v2.robot_rpi import RobotRpi
18  else:
19  from niryo_robot_rpi.panel_v1.robot_rpi import RobotRpi
20 
21  self.__niryo_robot_rpi = RobotRpi()
22 
23  # Set a bool to mention this node is initialized
24  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
25 
26 
27 if __name__ == '__main__':
28  sentry_init()
29 
30  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_rpi', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
31 
32  # change logger level according to node parameter
33  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
34  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
35  logger.setLevel(log_level)
36 
37  try:
38  node = NiryoRobotRpiNode()
39  rospy.spin()
40  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
41  pass
